description.en: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.ar: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.br: Use esse combustível experimental para aumentar a velocidade do seu voo em 20%. Para usar, clique duas vezes quando estiver no seu equipamento de voo e pressione a Tecla <X> para ativar ou desativar a aceleração.
description.cns: 使用这种实验性燃料可以在一定时间内提升20%飞行速度。若要使用，飞行时双击使用，并按<X>键开/关切换加速。
description.de: Dieser experimentelle Treibstoff kann deine Fluggeschwindigkeit temporär um bis zu 20% erhöhen. Doppelklicke während du fliegst und drücke die <X> Taste, um den Boost zu aktivieren und deaktivieren.
description.fi: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.fil: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.fr: Ce carburant expérimental augmente votre vitesse de vol de 20% pendant une durée limitée. Pour l'utiliser, double-cliquez dessus en vol et appuyez sur <X> pour activer ou désactiver le boost.
description.id: Penggunaan bahan bakar eksperimental ini dapat meningkatkan kecepatan terbangmu hingga 20% untuk waktu yang terbatas. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali saat dipasang dan tekan tombol <X> untuk mengaktifkan atau menonaktifkan peningkatan.
description.it: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.jp: このターボ・エランサーを使用すると、一定時間の飛行速度が最大で20％向上します。使用するには、飛行状態でアイテムを使用し、<X>キーでブーストのON/OFFを切り替えてください。
description.kr: 이 실험용 연료를 사용하면 제한된 시간 동안 비행 속도를 최대 20 %까지 높일 수 있습니다. 사용하려면 장착 된 상태에서 두 번 클릭하고 <X> 키를 눌러 부스트를 켜거나 끕니다.
description.nl: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.pl: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.ru: Это экспериментальное топливо временно повышает скорость полета на 20%. Для использования дважды щелкните по нему, а затем включайте и отключайте ускорение кнопкой <X>.
description.sp: Este combustible experimental puede aumentar tu velocidad de vuelo un 20% por tiempo limitado. Para usarlo, haz doble click estando montado y presiona la Tecla <X> para activar o desactivar el aumento.
description.sw: Use of this experimental fuel can increase your flying speed by up to 20% for a limited time. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.th: การใช้เชื้อเพลิงทดลองนี้สามารถเพิ่มความเร็วในการบินของคุณได้ถึง 20% ในช่วงเวลาจำกัด หากต้องการใช้ ให้ดับเบิลคลิกแล้วกดปุ่ม <X> เพื่อเปิดหรือปิดการบูสต์
description.tw: 雙擊使用渦輪燃料，飛行時按下<X>切換模式，可以提升飛行器速度20%
description.vi: Việc sử dụng loại nhiên liệu thử nghiệm này có thể tăng tốc độ bay của bạn lên tới 20% trong một thời gian giới hạn. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp trong khi gắn kết và nhấn phím <X> để bật hoặc tắt tăng cường.
